Table of Contents

Interface IDrawable

Namespace
osu.Framework.Graphics
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

Exposes various properties that are part of the public interface of Drawable. This interface should generally NOT be implemented by other classes than Drawable, but only used to specify that an object is of type Drawable. It is mostly useful in cases where you need to specify additional constraints on a Drawable, but also do not want to force inheriting from any particular subclass of Drawable.

public interface IDrawable : ITransformable

IsPresent

Whether this drawable is present for any sort of user-interaction. If this is false, then this drawable will not be drawn, it will not handle input, and it will not affect layouting (e.g. autosizing and flow).

bool IsPresent { get; }

Property Value

bool

ToLocalSpace(Vector2)

Convert a position to the local coordinate system from either native or local to another drawable. This is not the same space as the Position member variable (use Parent.GetLocalPosition() in this case).

Vector2 ToLocalSpace(Vector2 screenSpacePos)

Parameters

screenSpacePos Vector2

The input position.

Returns

Vector2

The output position.

ToSpaceOfOtherDrawable(Vector2, IDrawable)

Accepts a vector in local coordinates and converts it to coordinates in another Drawable's space.

Vector2 ToSpaceOfOtherDrawable(Vector2 input, IDrawable other)

Parameters

input Vector2

A vector in local coordinates.

other IDrawable

The drawable in which space we want to transform the vector to.

Returns

Vector2

The vector in other's coordinates.
